columns.name: bank_name
columns.description: Canonical bank name after consolidation.

columns.name: date_m
columns.description: Month end date (period end, monthly granularity).

columns.name: year_month
columns.description: YYYY-MM string for monthly period.

columns.name: failed
columns.description: Binary target: 1 if bank failed, else 0.

columns.name: WAR
columns.description: War dummy: 1 from 2022-03-01 onwards, else 0.

columns.name: Capital_Ratio
columns.description: Equity to Total Assets ratio (capital adequacy proxy).

columns.name: Cost_Income_Ratio
columns.description: Operating expenses to operating income.

columns.name: Liquid_Assets_Ratio
columns.description: Liquid assets to total assets.

columns.name: Loan_Deposit_Ratio
columns.description: Loans to customer deposits.

columns.name: NPL_Ratio
columns.description: Non-performing loans to gross loans.

columns.name: Net_Open_FX_Ratio
columns.description: Net open FX position to equity.

columns.name: ROA
columns.description: Return on Assets: net income / total assets.

columns.name: ROE
columns.description: Return on Equity: net income / equity.

columns.name: 01_Cross-border loans from BIS reporting banks
columns.description: Cross-border loans from BIS reporting banks (JEHD/BIS).

columns.name: 12_Liabilities to BIS banks (cons.), short term
columns.description: Short-term liabilities to BIS reporting banks, consolidated (JEHD/BIS).

columns.name: 22_Liabilities to BIS banks, locational, total
columns.description: Total locational liabilities to BIS banks (JEHD/BIS).

columns.name: 24_International reserves (excluding gold)
columns.description: International reserves excluding gold (JEHD).

columns.name: 27_Cross-border deposits with BIS rep. banks
columns.description: Cross-border deposits with BIS reporting banks (JEHD/BIS).

columns.name: cpi_x
columns.description: Consumer Price Index (variant X from merged macro sources).

columns.name: cpi_y
columns.description: Consumer Price Index (variant Y from merged macro sources).

columns.name: exchange_rate
columns.description: Exchange rate (local currency per USD) from merged macro sources.

columns.name: gdp_yoy_pct
columns.description: GDP year-over-year growth rate (WEO/IMF).

columns.name: interest_rate
columns.description: Policy or money market interest rate (from merged macro sources).

columns.name: reserves_pct_gdp
columns.description: International reserves as % of GDP (derived from WEO/IMF).

columns.name: ukraine_3y_change_pct
columns.description: Monthly percent change in Ukraine 3-year yield.

columns.name: ukraine_3y_yield
columns.description: Ukraine 3-year government bond yield (%).

columns.name: ukraine_3y_yield_z
columns.description: Z-scored Ukraine 3y yield (standardized).

columns.name: us_3y_yield
columns.description: United States Treasury 3-year yield (%).

columns.name: us_3y_yield_z
columns.description: Z-scored US 3y yield (standardized).

columns.name: yield_spread_ukr_us_3y
columns.description: Yield spread: Ukraine 3y minus US 3y (pp).

columns.name: yield_spread_ukr_us_3y_z
columns.description: Z-scored yield spread (standardized).

columns.name: 01_Cross-border loans from BIS reporting banks_lag1
columns.description: Lag-1 month of 01_Cross-border loans from BIS reporting banks. Duplicate suffix .1 indicates de-duplication needed in future cleanup.

columns.description: Lag-1 month of 01_Cross-border loans from BIS reporting banks. Duplicate suffix .1 indicates de-duplication needed in future cleanup.
